text: He didn't make it.He died of shock. No plasma.

text: You've done more thanany other man could have done

text: in the service of his country.

title: Hacksaw Ridge

text: finding out that he was oneof the bravest persons alive.

title: Hacksaw Ridge

text: was the irony of the whole thing.

text: Blood had run downinto the fella's face and eyes.
title: Hacksaw Ridge

text: He was laying there justgroaning and calling for a medic.
title: Hacksaw Ridge

text: I took water from my canteen,got some bandage, and I washed his face.

text: And when I... was washing his eyes,his eyes came open.

text: He says, "I thought I was blind."

text: And if I hadn't got anythingmore out of the war
